content: the clucky ladies chicken earwarmer is a fun quick project featuring everyone s favorite--chickens switch up your color scheme to make this a fitting knit for any holiday or season this makes a great stashbuster using just around 75 yds total in 4 different colors the pattern is written for adult size but has instructions for how to modify it to fit baby toddler and child sizes as well please find all of my other patterns on ravelry and find me on instagram and facebook @rosieposieknitco email me at rosieposieknitco@gmail com for pattern support enjoy and happy knitting
